item.title: Stumbling Into the Golang Spec and Trying to Make Sense of It
item.description: I am not sure whether this is a worth reading, because the golang specification is a good, self-contained. Anyway, I am writing this. The Go language specification describes a general standard for the language itself and describes the syntax using Wirth syntax notation , a variant of EBNF . So I want to learn about the interface type in Go, and the first thing I want, is how it is formed within a program, and I head to Go Programming Language Specification .
